text: Nichola kuja kwavija Mulungu kanigubulila kamba nolondigwa nichole. Abaho niwagwelela Usenga Unogile waubitile, Usenga uja unikalile niupeta mwa Wamhazi. Ila nigatenda gano kubitila mting'hano wa kifiso na vilangizi, kwavija nikala nidumba kamba kija kinitendile ama kija kinigendelela kutenda sambikipotele na mkimbilo wangu uwe jaga bule.
